statements: SELECT * FROM test_results WHERE test_id = 1;
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM test_results WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM test_results WHERE test_result <> 'Negative';
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM test_results ORDER BY test_result DESC;
SELECT patient_id, test_date FROM test_results WHERE test_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY test_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM test_results WHERE test_id = 1
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM test_results WHERE patient_id = 100 ORDER BY test_date DESC
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM test_results WHERE test_date > '2022-01-01' AND test_date < '2022-06-30'
SELECT test_name, COUNT(*) AS total_tests FROM test_results GROUP BY test_name ORDER BY total_tests DESC
SELECT patient_id, MAX(test_date) AS latest_test_date FROM test_results GROUP BY patient_id
SELECT * FROM test_results
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM test_results WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT * FROM test_results ORDER BY test_date DESC
SELECT name, specialization FROM healthcare_professionals
SELECT * FROM healthcare_professionals WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology'
SELECT * FROM test_results WHERE test_name = 'Blood Test';
SELECT id, test_result, test_date FROM test_results WHERE test_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT tr.test_name, tr.test_result, hp.name as doctor_name FROM test_results tr JOIN healthcare_professionals hp ON tr.patient_id = hp.id WHERE hp.specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT tr.test_name, COUNT(tr.id) as test_count FROM test_results tr GROUP BY tr.test_name HAVING COUNT(tr.id) > 1;

SELECT hp.name as doctor_name, tr.test_name, tr.test_result, tr.test_date FROM healthcare_professionals hp JOIN test_results tr ON hp.id = tr.patient_id WHERE hp.specialization = 'Neurology' ORDER BY tr.test_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, address FROM Patients WHERE gender='M';
SELECT * FROM LabTests WHERE test_type='Blood Test' ORDER BY test_date;
SELECT professional_name, specialization FROM HealthcareProfessionals;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM LabTests WHERE test_type = 'Blood Test';
SELECT Patients.patient_name, LabTests.test_type, LabTests.test_date FROM Patients JOIN LabTests ON Patients.patient_id = LabTests.patient_id;
SELECT professional_id, professional_name, specialization FROM HealthcareProfessionals WHERE hospital_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Patients
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE age > 50
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY gender ASC
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01'
SELECT Patients.patient_name, Tests.test_name, Tests.test_result FROM Patients INNER JOIN Tests ON Patients.patient_id = Tests.patient_id
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC, date_of_birth ASC;
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM Tests WHERE test_date >= '2021-01-01' AND test_date <= '2021-12-31';

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Tests.test_name, TestUpdates.update_time FROM Patients JOIN Tests ON Patients.patient_id = Tests.patient_id JOIN TestUpdates ON Tests.test_id = TestUpdates.test_id WHERE TestUpdates.update_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY TestUpdates.update_time DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM HealthcareProfessionals WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';

SELECT Tests.test_name, Patients.patient_name, TestUpdates.update_details FROM Tests JOIN Patients ON Tests.patient_id = Patients.patient_id JOIN TestUpdates ON Tests.test_id = TestUpdates.test_id WHERE Tests.test_result = 'Positive';
SELECT * FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT professional_name, specialization FROM healthcare_professionals ORDER BY professional_name;
SELECT test_type, test_result FROM test_results WHERE test_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT test_name, normal_range_min, normal_range_max FROM test_types WHERE type_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_tests, test_type FROM test_results GROUP BY test_type HAVING total_tests > 100 ORDER BY total_tests DESC;
SELECT p.patient_name, tr.test_date FROM patient_data p JOIN test_results tr ON p.patient_id = tr.patient_id ORDER BY tr.test_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT th.test_id, tt.test_name, th.test_result FROM test_history th JOIN test_types tt ON th.test_type = tt.test_name ORDER BY th.test_id ASC LIMIT 5;
